Welcome to Spec_pipeline’s documentation!¶

Here you can find the documentation for using this package. It was built for analyzing the Hot DOG spectra presented in Eisenhardt et al. (in prep.), but can be useful for analysis of more spectra.

Installation and Quick Start Guide¶

  • Installation
  • Quick Start

Spec_pipeline Package¶

Classes¶

Complex_Line_fit([line_name, spec])

Flexible method to fit emission lines.

DBSP_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file[, blue, …])

Module that reads a DBSP spectrum and returns a spec object.

DEIMOS_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file[, blue, …])

Module that read an DEIMOS spectrum and returns a spec object.

GMOS_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file[, …])

Module that read a GMOS spectrum and returns a spec object.

LRIS_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file[, blue, …])

Module that reads an LRIS spectrum and returns a spec object.

Multi_Line_fit(line_name[, lines_file, …])

Main method to fit emission lines.

SDSS_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file)

Module that read an SDSS spectrum and returns a spec object.
